definitions.definition: A private chapel or prayer room . [from 14th c.]
A Roman Catholic chapel ; a building for public or private worship that is not a parish church .
( specifically ) A Catholic church belonging to the Oratory of Saint Philip Neri .

main_definition: A private chapel or prayer room . [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: A Roman Catholic chapel ; a building for public or private worship that is not a parish church .
( specifically ) A Catholic church belonging to the Oratory of Saint Philip Neri .

definitions.definition: The art of public speaking , especially in a formal , expressive , or forceful manner.
Eloquence ; the quality of artistry and persuasiveness in speech or writing .

main_definition: The art of public speaking , especially in a formal , expressive , or forceful manner. [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: Eloquence ; the quality of artistry and persuasiveness in speech or writing .
